price: ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ߝߊ ߞߴߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߘߎ߰ߞߟߏ ߞߊ߲߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߛߐ߫ ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߘߏ߫ ߝߍ߬ߙߍ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
